title: Relates to notice and filing of application for a real property tax exemption for senior citizens
summary: Provides additional notice of the real property tax exemption for senior citizens under section 467 of the real property tax law and requires municipal corporations to permit late filings within 60 days of the statutory deadline from persons previously granted such exemption.
